channel.title: Hierarchical Data :: Choria Configuration Manager
channel.description: The Choria Hierarchical Data Resolver is a small data resolver inspired by Hiera. It evaluates a YAML or JSON document alongside a set of facts to produce a final data map. The resolver supports first and deep merge strategies and relies on expression-based string interpolation for hierarchy entries. It is optimized for single files that hold both hierarchy and data, rather than the multi-file approach common in Hiera. Key features:
